member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.WhiteLevelAdjustmentEffect
member.summary: This effect allows the white level of an image to be linearly scaled. This is especially helpful when you convert between display-referred luminance space and scene-referred luminance space, or vice versa.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D White level adjustment effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.WhiteLevelAdjustmentEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WhiteLevelAdjustmentEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.WhiteLevelAdjustmentEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.WhiteLevelAdjustmentEffect.InputWhiteLevel
member.summary: The white level of the input image, in nits. Default value 80.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.WhiteLevelAdjustmentEffect.OutputWhiteLevel
member.summary: The white level of the output image, in nits. Default value 80.
